description.p: You have been forced to fight, possibly for your life, since you were young. You may have been a slave, purchased to provide cheap thrills for your owner. You may have been introduced into a rough life by your family, or entered yourself willingly to earn money when times were hard.

Skill Proficiencies:Athletics, plus your choice of one between Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Intimidation.
Tool Proficiencies:one Gaming set, choose one from: one language (Speak/Read), one Gaming set, one Instrument, Land vehicles, Water vehicles.
Equipment:gaming set, traveler's clothes, healing potion, hand wraps (bandages - one use medical kit), club, pouch containing 20 gp.
Any class can start as a pit fighter, but fighters are most common.

setters.set: Athletics, Acrobatics / Animal Handling / Intimidation, Gaming Set, 1 Language / Instrument / Vehicles (Land) / Vehicles (Water)

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Mercy. I never kill (Good)
Vicious. I never spare anyone who is stupid enough to fight me (Evil)
Honor. I give 100% and respect anyone who gives their all (Lawful)
Dirty Fighter. I never fight fair because I never know what my opponent will do (Chaotic)
Respect. I respect the strong and the skilled; I don't care what they stand for (Neutral)
Uncaring. I'm out for myself. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I fight for my family.
I need glory and respect.
I fight for my freedom, and need to be sure I'm never in another's power again.
I was bought and thrown into the pit; I will see my former owner thrown into that same pit with me.
I will help anyone who is poor and desperate.
I will see those who make others suffer for their entertainment feel true pain.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I hate all those with money and power.
I am an addict; I use to forget.
I cannot back down from a challenge.
I never fight unless I have no other choice.
I will never pass up the chance to expose a well-regarded person who hides a shameful secret.
I think all authority figures who enforce laws (guards, military, etc.) are corrupt; I challenge and mock them.

description.p: You know how to find fighting houses in every big city, and can tell if one is present in a smaller settlement within a day of being there. You can earn a poor living for yourself fighting for others entertainment. In addition, you can spot who is a brutal fighter and who is scared. You can also tell who is running the show, and who the high rollers are in the crowd.
